Name: Zero-G Gunfight
About the game: WWIII has ended in total annihilation but the battle continues in outer space. Challenge 1-3 friends in the fast-paced & frantic arenas of Zero-G Gunfight. Pickup different guns that change how you move & fight. Dodge enemy bullets & avoid unique hazards as you strive to be the last one standing! Decades of a fragile peace are gone, the weapons of war are being mobilized as even the vastness of space is not big enough for peace. Prepare yourself for the fast paced arenas of Zer0-G Gunfight where only the best will survive and bring their nation one set closer to intergalactic supremacy! Features: 2-4 player local PvP Single Player Time Trail Unique Arenas Guns change they way you move and fight
